comments:
description:
IllegalArgumentException thrown out when click on "show Report Parameters" 
button when preview

steps to reproduce:
1. new a cascading parameter group
2. new a static parameter and drag it to layout view
3. drag the static parameter to cascading parameter group
4. preview
5. click on "show Report Parameters" button

actual result:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException thrown out

Exception stack trace:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: assertion failed; 
...
at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.getCo
mbo(InputParameterDialog.java:507)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.getSe
lectionChoice(InputParameterDialog.java:618)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.build
ChoiceList(InputParameterDialog.java:533)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.rendP
arameterComboBox(InputParameterDialog.java:485)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.rendS
calarParameter(InputParameterDialog.java:336)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.rende
rParameterWidgets(InputParameterDialog.java:209)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.rende
rParameterWidgets(InputParameterDialog.java:204)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.InputParameterDialog.creat
eDialogArea(InputParameterDialog.java:168)...

Forbid drag and drop external parameter into cascading group. Because parameters 
in a cascading parameter group has relationshiop between each other. An external 
parameter will offense the internal logics those parameters should have.
